title: 1. PRODUCT-MARKET FIT
label: PRODUCT-MARKET FIT
text:
Technical founders develop novel clinical AI application but struggle to find product market fit.

Open provided a fractional CXAIO that:

  • Connected to key opinion leaders at 10 United States hospital systems
  • Led product discovery cycles with payors, providers to define ideal customer profile
  • Helped develop MVP concept
  • Mapped out data integrations with health information systems
  • Designed scientific evaluation metrics and communication strategy
  • Tested marketing materials for first market segment first early adopters
  • Defined pricing model for value based and FFS providers
  • Made qualified introductions to help land first paid customer

title: 2. EARLY STAGE GO-TO-MARKET PLAN
label: EARLY GO-TO-MARKET
text:
Pre-seed studio / hospital spin out company with early novel AI model and technical lead but struggling to define go to market plan.

Open provided a fractional CXAIO that:

  • Led product management discovery and MVP design, transitioning to full time PM hire
  • Validated business model with payors and reimbursement consultant
  • Developed data science and engineering team recruiting roadmaps
  • Provided real world evaluation framework / measures for presenting results to clinicians / administrators
  • Connected company to digital health investors
  • Developed health information system integration plan for full cycle MLOps
  • Recruited top trained data science lead
  • Contacted world leading AI regulatory consultant

title: 3. STRATEGIC OPTIONS
label: STRATEGIC OPTIONS
text:
Point solution AI startup with market traction at growth inflection point exploring next venture financing round or strategic acquisition

Open provided a fractional CXAIO that:

  • Leverage expert AI market network to determine company position in market
  • Use data and relationships with venture and strategic acquirers to generate real world options for strategic fit
  • Create double consent ''good fit'' meeting opportunities between venture and aligned / interested investors
  • Recruited top AI executive and board member to prepare for next round
  • Provided market perspective and experience to guide CEO / board through diligence and closing process
